info.name: deviantART Sta.sh Consistency
info.description: Changes Sta.sh's background and menu to be consistent with the main site -- also uses custom logo to mimic the main site's logo.
info.additionalInfo:
21 Jul, 2015 v1.0 - Initial release
22 Jul, 2015 v1.1 - Added other definitions that make the mobile sta.sh more consistent with the rest of the theme. If this is unpopular, it can be removed. Also updated the logo to be similarly sized to the main site's.
